thread.section_title: Movavi отзывы | Отзывы клиентов о Movavi | www.movavi.com
thread.title: Lyssa Renee

author: Lyssa Renee
title: Lyssa Renee
text: I've always used he default program on my windows computer to edit videos. After many years of frustration I finally decided to do some research and look for alternative programs. I came across Movavi and tried the program. First off, it's great that they give you a free trial that is actually good! The interface of the program is very well done and even a person that is completely clueless when it comes to creating videos would be able to create a masterpiece! Such an awesome program.
